info.title: UBIK Public API
info.description: Publicly accessible API endpoints for UBIK.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all LLM models accessible to the user.

schema.title: Response List Available Models Models Get

get.description: Retrieves a list of assistants accessible to the user. This endpoint is not available for end-user scoped requests.

schema.title: Response List Available Assistants Assistants Get

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of agent sessions. Use 'X-End-User-ID' header to filter by your end-users.

post.description: Creates a new agent session. Provide 'external_user_id' to isolate this session for a specific end-user.

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific agent session.

patch.description: Updates an existing agent session. Can be used to change the title, model, or active tools.

delete.description: Deletes an agent session and all associated messages.

get.description: Retrieves a list of tools accessible to the agent session with full details.

schema.title: Response List Session Tools Agent Sessions  Session Id  Tools Get

get.description: Retrieves the active branch of messages for the session.

post.description: Adds a user message to the session and optionally triggers the agent to generate a response.

Regenerates the response for a specific message. If the message is from the assistant, it re-runs the parent user message (creating a new assistant sibling). If it's from the user, it re-runs that user message (creating a new assistant sibling).
Edits a user message (creating a new branch) and regenerates the response.
Switches the active branch of the conversation to a specific message.

get.description: Retrieves details of a specific message, including sibling IDs for branching.
Retrieves a list of checkpoints for the agent session.

post.description: Resumes the agent session from a specific checkpoint.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of documents linked to the agent session, including their starred status.

post.description: Links existing documents to the agent session context.
Uploads a file and immediately links it to the agent session.

delete.description: Unlinks a document from the agent session context.

put.description: Stars or unstars a document within the agent session.

get.description: Streams Server-Sent Events (SSE) for the agent session. By default, it streams the current or most recent task, replaying past events first.

parameters.name: token

schema.description: Short-lived JWT token for authentication (alternative to header).
schema.title: Token

parameters.description: Short-lived JWT token for authentication (alternative to header).

parameters.name: task_id

schema.description: The ID of the task to stream. If omitted, streams the current or most recent task.
schema.title: Task Id

parameters.description: The ID of the task to stream. If omitted, streams the current or most recent task.

parameters.name: include_chunks

schema.description: Whether to include partial content chunks in the stream.
schema.title: Include Chunks

parameters.description: Whether to include partial content chunks in the stream.

get.description: Health check endpoint for the public API.
Get the details of the current user.

Retrieves a paginated list of all workspaces accessible to the user.
This includes personal workspaces and shared company workspaces.

items.name: My Project Workspace
items.description: Contains all documents related to the Q1 sales report.

post.description: Creates a new personal workspace for the user.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific workspace, provided the user has access.

example.name: My Project Workspace
example.description: Contains all documents related to the Q1 sales report.

delete.description: Deletes a workspace, provided the user is the owner.

parameters.name: workspace_id

schema.description: The unique identifier of the workspace.
schema.title: Workspace Id

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the workspace.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of documents within a specific workspace.
Retrieves a paginated list of all documents accessible to the user.

post.summary: Ingest documents from files or URLs
post.description:
Unified endpoint to ingest documents from various sources.

This endpoint can handle file uploads and URL scraping in a single request.
It uses multipart/form-data.

- To upload files, include them in the 'files' part of the form.
- To scrape URLs, provide a comma-separated string in the 'urls' form field.
- Specify workspace IDs to associate the ingested documents with specific workspaces.

**Note:** Supported file types depend on the server's active capabilities (e.g. audio/video files require transcription to be enabled).

get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific document, provided the user has access.

delete.description:
Delete a document. This will remove the document from the user's default workspace
and, if they are the last owner, delete it from the system entirely.

post.description: Reprocess a document using a different pipeline, optionally updating the file content.
Adds a document to one or more workspaces.

delete.description: Removes a document from one or more workspaces.

delete.summary: Remove a document from a workspace
delete.description: Removes a document's association from a specific workspace without deleting the document itself.

parameters.name: workspace_id

schema.description: The unique identifier of the workspace.
schema.title: Workspace Id

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the workspace.

parameters.name: document_id

schema.description: The unique identifier of the document.
schema.title: Document Id

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the document.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all tools accessible to the user.

items.name: Financial Data Extractor
items.description: Extracts key financial metrics from annual reports.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific tool, provided the user has access.

parameters.name: tool_id

schema.description: The unique identifier or name of the tool.
schema.title: Tool Id

parameters.description: The unique identifier or name of the tool.

example.name: Financial Data Extractor
example.description: Extracts key financial metrics from annual reports.

stock_symbol.description: The stock symbol of the company.

report_year.description: The year of the financial report.

get.description: Retrieves the necessary details for embedding a tool's UI, including its schema and allowed domains. Optionally accepts 'external_user_id' to scope the returned access token.

parameters.name: tool_id

schema.description: The unique identifier or name of the tool.
schema.title: Tool Id

parameters.description: The unique identifier or name of the tool.

parameters.name: external_user_id

schema.description: Optional external user ID to scope the access token.
schema.title: External User Id

parameters.description: Optional external user ID to scope the access token.

post.description: Exchange a valid API Key for a short-lived JWT access token. Optionally provide 'external_user_id' to scope the token to a specific end-user.
Asynchronously starts a tool execution and returns an execution ID to track the results.

parameters.name: tool_id

schema.description: The unique identifier or name of the tool to execute.
schema.title: Tool Id

parameters.description: The unique identifier or name of the tool to execute.

get.description: Retrieves the status and result of a specific tool execution.

parameters.name: execution_id

schema.description: The unique identifier of the tool execution.
schema.title: Execution Id

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tool execution.

get.description: Streams Server-Sent Events (SSE) for a tool execution.

parameters.name: execution_id

schema.description: The unique identifier of the tool execution.
schema.title: Execution Id

post.summary: Provide input to a waiting tool
post.description: Provides the required input to a tool execution that is in the 'waiting_for_input' state.

parameters.name: execution_id

schema.description: The unique identifier of the tool execution that is waiting for input.
schema.title: Execution Id

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tool execution that is waiting for input.
